评论详情: This bag is really nice! I love it!
A little smaller than the picture makes out but big enough for a purse. I love it, Material is great!
I like that this is actually red not wine or oxblood. Lots of room and definitely cute!
This fits all my stuff nicely. It’s a great little bag for the price.

评论概述: It arrives in a transparent bag, exposing contents
评论详情: It arrives in a transparent bag, exposing contents.  It's a little larger than I expected. It specified small bag, not so small.  I'm not sure if I am keeping it.  I would have liked it delivered in a brown envelope.I'll see it if it works for me, if not, I'll return it.

I thought it looked a little too small and won't be able to fit the things I need but it has plenty of space and I love how easy it is to adjust the straps. The color is beautiful and fits with everything I wear. The zipper does get caught in the inside once in a while and can be a little annoying to undo. It can get pretty heavy if you put a laptop or a lot of stuff in there. But the durability is great have no problems with it.

评论概述: The liner has excess material and swallows up anything placed inside
评论详情: Color is good.  Style definitely grung style but liner does not work
I absolutely love this bag. I wear it every day now since I’ve gotten it. It’s very spacious and you can fit many things in it.
I’ve been wearing this everyday since I got it . It stores a bunch and is very durable as well as fashionable. If you are in the market for a messenger type bag I would definitely recommend.
thought the size was big in the pucture but it is for a small kid's size it should show how big it is for an adult disappointed was not the real size as shown

I was worried this wouldn’t work out but it’s great! It fits so much without feeling heavy and is actually one of the more comfortable backpacks I’ve worn. It fits my sketchbook and art supplies, my iPad / keyboard in a case, and a book. I also find it easy to get in and out of. The first time I used the main pouch zipper it caught on the inside lining but it hasn’t happened since. Only used it a few weeks, but so far so good!
Very small, child size I couldn’t get it on my back! I had to return it
I needed a bag that could handle being thrown around and this bag is doing just that. I love the comfort of it and the space I have to fit everything I need. It’s become my favorite go-to bag.

Awsome bag! At first when I opened it I thought it was gonna be to small but it's just perfect! Has plenty of space to fit in my sketchbook and more!! Super cute too! Can't wait to decorate it with more pins in the future!!
Bought it for a cruise we were taking so we had something small to carry things around in. This is a little smaller than any of us had planned for but was still helpful on our trip.

评论概述: It's exactly as pictured. Super cute.
评论详情: Obsessed.
She loved it

评论概述: It came in a clear plastic bag! 🎒
评论详情: I plan on using this bag tomorrow. It seems to be sturdy enough. I took points off my rating because it came in a clear plastic bag.

I love the color and size of this bag. It looks to be well made, like it will last a long time. Love the exterior compartment big enough to hold tablets and such, and the interior zippered pocket. I gave four stars because the opening seems small and somewhat restrictive for my personal use. But overall love it!
Holds a lot. Comfortable on the shoulder. Perfect fit for me. Durable, smooth zipper, nice color, and easy adjustable side straps
My favorite backpack for the gym, planes and literally anything else.

Really good size for a purse, nice to be able to wear as a backpack. A few spots with sloppy stitching, and the lining is not sewed into the inside of the outer fabric so it is loose and sometimes gets caught in the zipper.
So meh. The bag is kind of cute. However I was expecting a waterproof bag. It claims to be in the description. VERY disappointing

Quality construction, good design. Not too big but perfectly sized for what I wanted to carry. The fabric is nice, a soft canvas. The lining seemed huge at first but after all my stuff was in, it was fine. Washed on gentle cold cycle, line dried then fluffed in the dryer. Looks brand new!
I love this bag. The material is a good quality. I can actually find my keys and phone thanks to the outside pocket. Good versatility. Wear it as a backpack or hang it off your arm.

I absolutely ADOREE this bag!! It won’t be able to hold things like laptops but it’s super cute for notebooks, ipads, etc. I wasn’t sure how i’d feel about the handles at the top but I ended up loving them. BUY THIS NOW
Nice backpack. Looking for a red bag, however, this back was dull and did not give the red vibe.
It hold a lot of things. The only I have with it is the zipper. It’s always getting caught inside the line . Other than that it’s great.
I absolutely love! LOVE this!! Thank you 😊
I LOVE IT! perfect size :)
I needed something smaller that I just wanted to fit a pair of work shoes in and small misc things. This works great!
Just what I was looking for! Seller was amazing
Loved it but it was to small for what I expected
I got this bag for myself and I absolutely love it! It holds a good bit and is very well made.

Love the look & size.  Color is more of a orangy ketchup muted red color. Looks like a brighter red in photos here than in person. But, it's a nice color and I like the black hardware.  Very comfy backpack straps. Very adjustable.  Roomy inside. If I had any complaints it would be that I wish it had a zipper pocket in the back.  But, the one in front is large and there is a smaller one inside, along with two slotted pockets for keys & stuff.  Like the sturdiness and canvas material.  It's a nice change from my leather bags.  Holds a lot!

This is a cute backpack. I purchased the red, and I love the material.  It looks just like the advertised product, and seems to be well made.  I think this is a great size, too, as it is between my mini and my full sized bags.  It did take a while to receive it, but I'm happy with the purchase.
I used this as an everyday casual purse and I love it. I don’t like bulky and this is not. The size is perfect. Had to wait a while to get it, but it was worth it.
Roomy, fun bag!
